resources.string: Love2Love
CoupleApp
Love2Love uses your location to calculate the distance between you and your partner, and to allow you to add places to your shared memories.
Love2Love needs access to your photos to allow you to personalize your profile and add images to your shared memories in the couple\'s journal.
Love2Love sends you notifications when your partner sends you a message. You can disable these notifications at any time in Settings.
Access Photos
Activate notifications

What is something you find beautiful about me that I don’t value enough?
